sense.gloss: to mind, to care about, to be concerned about, to have a regard for
to be an issue, to matter, to create inconvenience
to keep company, to care for, to look after, to entertain, to pay attention to, to spend time with
to interfere with, to meddle in

sdata.j: ↑毎朝↑↓まいあさ↓↑運転↑↓うんてん↓するのに↑結|構↑↓けっこう↓う|んざりしてきていたのよ。
sdata.e: I'm getting pretty tired of driving every morning.

sdata.j: ↑毎朝↑↓まいあさ↓↑運転↑↓うんてん↓するのに↑結|構↑↓けっこう↓う|んざりしてきていたのよ。
sdata.e: I'm getting pretty bored with driving every morning.

sdata.j: もう|↑構↑↓かま↓う|のはやめてくれよ。
トムはフランス↑語↑↓ご↓が↑結|構↑↓けっこう↓う|まいと↑思↑↓おも↓うよ。
sdata.e: I think Tom is pretty good at French.

sdata.j: トムはフランス↑語↑↓ご↓が↑結|構↑↓けっこう↓う|まいと↑思↑↓おも↓うよ。
sdata.e: I think that Tom is pretty good at French.
